prompts: Create a majestic bird Pokemon with dark feathers and shining metal accents.
I want a flying-type Pokemon that looks like a knight, with armor and powerful wings.
Generate an elegant bird creature with a sleek body and striking red patterns.
Make a Pokemon that soars through the skies, featuring sharp, metallic wings and a fierce look.
Imagine a mysterious avian Pokemon with a blend of dark colors and a commanding presence.
Design a powerful bird Pokemon that embodies strength and elegance, perfect for high-altitude battles.
Give me a Pokemon with a unique design that represents both grace and ferocity in the air.
